text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActSite where concept is-a _HumanSubstanceAdministrationSite

name: HumanSubstanceAdministrationSite
title: HumanSubstanceAdministrationSite
description: The set of body locations to or through which a drug product may be administered.
